content.question: In the circuit shown in the figure, the current in the ammeter is zero. What is the resistance <math alttext="R sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mi>X</mi></msub></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="100 ohms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>100</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>
<math alttext="300 ohms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>300</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>
<math alttext="400 ohms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>400</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>
<math alttext="600 ohms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>600</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="600 ohms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>600</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
